h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
h2_title: Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Along the way, you'll be encouraged to pluck a hair to unlock your first Keeper's Shrine and meet the Keeper of the Black Wind Mountain. Interact with the Shrine after the cutscene and go down to **Trailblazer's Gift** to claim your items.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Claim_Deluxe_Edition_Items.md', within the main section titled 'How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items', specifically from the subsection 'Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Along the way, you'll be encouraged to pluck a hair to unlock your first Keeper's Shrine and meet the Keeper of the Black Wind Mountain. Interact with the Shrine after the cutscene and go down to **Trailblazer's Gift** to claim your items.
